name: GCP Kubernetes Engine Clusters have Cloud Monitoring disabled
description: This policy identifies Kubernetes Engine Clusters which have disabled Cloud monitoring. Enabling Cloud monitoring will let the Kubernetes Engine to monitor signals and build operations in the clusters.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND api.name = 'gcloud-container-describe-clusters' AND json.rule = 'monitoringService does not exist or monitoringService equals none'
recommendation:
1. Login to GCP Portal
2. Go to 'Kubernetes Engine' (Left Panel)
3. Select 'Clusters'
4. From the list of clusters, click on the reported cluster
5. Under 'Features', click on the edit button (pencil icon) in front of 'Cloud Monitoring'
6. In the 'Edit Cloud Monitoring' dialog, enable the 'Enable Cloud Monitoring' checkbox
7. Click on 'Save Changes'
